name: Ants life
description:
Welcome to Ants life. This is an arcade survival game, where you have to eat and collect resources to become stronger, but beware! you are not the only one in the garden. Survive the harsh wilderness of modern backyards and remember, ants are stronger together!

Features:
  • Multiple recources to gather
  • Simple gameplay
  • Mini quests with inmediate rewards
  • An easy to learn difficulty system
The team:
  • Lead designer, programmer: me
    • https://frod007.itch.io/
  • Artist, level designer: A_Bad_Artist
    • https://www.instagram.com/a_bad_artist_00/
  • Sfx, music designer: Zicklose
    • https://www.instagram.com/zicklose/
